name: GhostKids
description: BOO is the utility token from the Ghost Kid DAO NFT project, which is used to participate in the Ghost Kid ecosystem. The token is generated through a staking mechanism, which means that users can earn the token by holding or staking a certain amount of the existing tokens. This token can be used to access various features and services within the Ghost Kid ecosystem, such as participating in governance decisions, accessing exclusive content, or trading with other users.
